Text: Get it and play for chill-out (apart from a couple, tho' SabreDance should be great for climax!). Some slight tech quibbles, but it's not Seeder's fault.  Would you believe it, but 40 years ago DCS (Distinct Channel Separation) was a selling point, so you get this annoying one-instrument-to-the-left, one-to-the-right syndrome. Only remastering would cure, and these albums deserve it.
